channel.title: New Magic Interface
channel.description:
Okay guys so I was wondering how to make a copy of the magic interface without the regular magic icons or sprites... as in a blank magic interface to put custom sprites to make my own custom magic spell book.
EDIT: well I'm looking through my class9 and seeing the luner spell book interface does anyone know how i could make a copy of that interface to make the custom one?

item.title: New Magic Interface
item.dc:creator: @r0m3r0 r0m3r0
item.description:
@r0m3r0 wrote:

right now that’s what I’m trying to do thanks now i just have to figure out how to actually use it lol

Read full topic
